citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A written program of veterinary care with a current attending veterinarian for the facility has not been completed and kept
up to date. The program of veterinary care available during this inspection included a veterinarian who is no longer the
facility’s attending veterinarian. The written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits by the attending
veterinarian ensures that the facility has a program to follow, and all animals have adequate veterinary care. Each dealer
and exhibitor shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In the case of a part-time attending
veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary care and
regularly scheduled visits to the premises. The written Program of Veterinary Care in consultation with the facility's current
attending veterinarian must be made available for review.
Correct by 11/11/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
ALEXANDRA ANDRICOS, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
